context_right: ThreatLabz team has observed multiple active malspam campaigns with links to malicious JavaScript payloads in the wild.
_context_right: ThreatLabz team has observed multiple active malspam campaigns with links to malicious JavaScript payloads in the wild.
sentence_right: These JavaScript files when opened by the end user will trigger download and execution of malware executables belonging to various Dropper and Backdoor Trojan families.
label: Zscaler ((US English)) is a cloud security company, with headquarters in San Jose, California. It offers a platform for businesses that move their data to the cloud, with employees who work remotely.

context_right: ThreatLabZ will continue to monitor these malspam campaigns involving malicious scripts to ensure that Zscaler customers are protected.
_context_right: ThreatLabZ will continue to monitor these malspam campaigns involving malicious scripts to ensure that Zscaler customers are protected.
sentence_left: It is increasingly important to have multiple security layers to block these kinds of attacks.
